sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Poor Robin's true character of a scold, or, The shrews looking-glass dedicated to all domineering dames, wives rampant, cuckolds couohant, and hen-peckt sneaks, in city or country. Poor Robin. Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.
8 p.
Printed for L.C., London : 1678.
William Winstanley is usually credited with authorship of the "Poor Robin" pamphlets, although imitators undoubtedly wrote some of them. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

8 p.
Printed for L.C., London : 1678.
William Winstanley is usually credited with authorship of the "Poor Robin" pamphlets, although imitators undoubtedly wrote some of them. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
